name: Hotel Restaurante Andria

reviews.text: Recently stayed in this property and the rooms are not at all what they appear on the hotel's website. Instead, our room was small, dark, dingy and it had a faint bad smell. Nor is the breakfast buffet the extrensive buffet the hotel claims. It was a pretty limited affair and we were very turned off by the filthy walls in the dining room by the breakfast area. Moreover, there's no elevator in the property meaning that you have to carry your luggage up the stairs into the hotel and then up to your floor. We could not recommend this hotel and our suggestion woulod be to stay at another property.
reviews.title: Stay somewhere else
charming place to stay
reviews.text: If you like bland, characterless, multiple chain hotels, this is NOT for you. But if you appreciate individuality, care, attention, charm, uniqueness, then stay at the Andria.

description: 7 km from Andorra, Hotel Andria is a small hotel founded at the end of the 19th century managed by the 4th generation of the Peguera-Sort family. Located in a beautiful modernist-style building with an entranceway garden that, together with the entrance columns, gives the place a stately look. it has a terrace with a portico, TV lounge, fireplace lounge and a wine cellar from the 12th century. Our numerous collections of antiques add flavour and ambiance to all these places.
